.mail.info:
You can use keywords in the subject and content. They are replace with the respective values before the mail is send.

{username}: Username, {booktitle}: Book Title
.mail.info.content:
Hallo {username},
You have shown interest in the book '{booktitle}.'
Now it is back in the library, reserved for you to borrow.

Regards,
The Library Team.
.mail.info.subject: '{booktitle}' is back in the library
.mail.info.title: Info
.mail.label.title: Subject
.mail.overdue.content:
Hello {username},
The borrowing period for the book '{booktitle}' has expired.
Please bring it back to the library.

Regards,
The Library Team.
.mail.overdue.subject: '{booktitle}' has expired
.mail.overdue.title: Expiration
.mail.overdue2.content:
